with pride we are presenting

OUR BENCHMARK PROJECTS

open since 2007

Amul Dairy Chocolate Plant

Largest Chocolate plant of India.
Taste of India on Vidhyut’s Panels.

KarnaPrayag Tunnel (L&T ECC)

Longest Tunnel of Asia 102 Km – Rishikesh to KarnaPrayag Will reduce the travel me from 6 Hrs to 2 Hrs. Remember Vidhyut when you enjoy this tunnel. 

Shreemad Raj Chandra Hospital

Biggest Mul Speciality Charitable Hospital of 250 beds. Covering 500 Tribal Villages of South Gujarat near Dharampur. All HT & LT + OPD Panels from Vidhyut – SEVA.

Bullet Train - Ahmedabad to Mumbai (L&T ECC)

A Dream project of respected Prime Minister – Mr. Modi.
Speed & Reliability of Bullet train on reliability of Vidhyut’s Panels

COLGATE

Good Morning with Colgate – Say Good morning to Vidhyut.

Shreemad Raj Chandra Satsang hall

Largest Satsang hall of the world. Connecting people tosoul. It’s Providing spiritual evaluation to the people.
Vidhyut Panels – ensures a seamless power to 10,000+ souls that sing in Dhyan & Satsang.

TATA Enterprise

TATA – A name of trust. They Trust Vidhyut for panels.

Reliance Retail

Giant of India – Vidhyut on its way to become giant.

Sathya Sai Charitable Trust Hospital

100% Charitable renowned hospital Un-interupted power through Vidhyut’s Panels.
